snippet: The museum is now scheduled to reopen in 2017 after a $12 million renovation project....
abstract: Bass Museum of Art in Miami Beach postpones re-opening due to construction delays in its $12 million renovation project.
lead_paragraph: The museum is now scheduled to reopen in 2017 after a $12 million renovation project.

headline.main: Reopening of Miami Beach’s Bass Museum Is Delayed
